name: LSDriver 1+2 (Remastered Collection)
description:
LSDriver 1 + 2 is a compilation of 2 racing games with real physics and ragdoll style characters that lose parts of their bodies, have fun trying to complete very crazy tracks.

FEATURES:

  • 2 games in 1.
  • Real Physics.
  • Funny Ragdolls.
  • Very Crazy Levels.
  • Made by Blender Game Engine.

REMASTERED CHANGES:

  • Both games have new end screens.
  • LSDriver 1 has level selection.
  • LSDriver 2 has new musics and new textures.
